This should not be populated in a message corresponding to a ServiceRequest (eg ORM)
Note that when using SNOMED codes in SPM-8, these are covered.

This should be mapped top the correct ServiceRequest.dataAbsentReason as the speciman is rejected in the context of a particular test given the specimen condition.  Since the placement of the SPM in the message is not always clear as to which ORC/OBR it relates to, we cannot provide specific mapping beyond the vocabulary map.
